definitions: A minute arachnid that has a spherical or ovoid body and no division between the cephalothorax and abdomen. Many kinds are parasitic on animals and plants, and some transmit diseases.
A very small person or thing.
A small coin or sum of money.
A very small amount or degree.
examples: Dust mites are a common cause of allergies.
The new intern was a mere mite of a man.
She contributed her last mite to the collection.
There's not a mite of difference between them.
